parameters.name: regionCode
parameters.value: ={{ (() => {   const messageText = $json.message.text;   const regionMatch = messageText.match(/region:([a-zA-Z]{2})\s*$/i);    if (regionMatch) {     const inputRegion = regionMatch[1].toLowerCase();     const regionMapping = {       'id': 'ID',       'us': 'US',       'gb': 'GB',       'uk': 'GB',       'jp': 'JP',       'kr': 'KR',       'au': 'AU',       'ca': 'CA',       'de': 'DE',       'fr': 'FR',       'br': 'BR',       'mx': 'MX',       'in': 'IN',       'th': 'TH',       'my': 'MY',       'sg': 'SG',       'ph': 'PH',       'vn': 'VN'     };      return regionMapping[inputRegion] || 'ID';   }    return 'ID'; })() }}

parameters.text:
= {{ (() => {   try {     const channelData = $('Ambil Info Channel').item.json.items?.[0];     const videosData = $('Ambil Data Video Channel').item.json.items || [];     const statsData = $('Statistik Video Channel').item.json.items || [];     const aiResponse = $('Analisis AI').item.json;      if (!channelData) {       return '‚ùå Error: Data channel tidak ditemukan';     }      function formatNumber(num) {       if (!num) return 'N/A';       const number = parseInt(num);       if (number >= 1_000_000) return (number / 1_000_000).toFixed(1) + 'M';       if (number >= 1_000) return (number / 1_000).toFixed(1) + 'K';       return number.toLocaleString();     }      function getTimeSince(publishedAt) {       const now = new Date();       const published = new Date(publishedAt);       const diffHours = Math.floor((now - published) / (1000 * 60 * 60));       const diffDays = Math.floor(diffHours / 24);       return diffDays > 0 ? `${diffDays} hari yang lalu` : `${diffHours} jam yang lalu`;     }      function calculateVPH(viewCount, publishedAt) {       if (!viewCount) return 0;       const now = new Date();       const published = new Date(publishedAt);       const diffHours = Math.max(1, (now - published) / (1000 * 60 * 60));       return Math.round(parseInt(viewCount) / diffHours);     }      function decode(text) {       if (!text) return '';       return text         .replace(/&/g, '&')         .replace(/</g, '<')         .replace(/>/g, '>')         .replace(/"/g, '"')         .replace(/'/g, "'")         .replace(/ /g, ' ');     }      const aiText = decode(aiResponse?.candidates?.[0]?.content?.parts?.[0]?.text || 'Tidak tersedia');      const statsMap = Object.fromEntries(statsData.map(stat => [stat.id, stat.statistics]));      const videosWithStats = videosData.map(video => ({       ...video,       statistics: statsMap[video.id.videoId] || {}     }));      const topVideos = [...videosWithStats]       .sort((a, b) => parseInt(b.statistics?.viewCount || 0) - parseInt(a.statistics?.viewCount || 0))       .slice(0, 3);      const recentVideos = videosWithStats.slice(0, 5);      const createdDate = new Date(channelData.snippet?.publishedAt);     const avgViews = formatNumber(       videosWithStats.reduce((sum, v) => sum + parseInt(v.statistics?.viewCount || 0), 0) / videosWithStats.length || 0     );      let message = '*üìä ANALISIS CHANNEL*

';     message += `*‚ñ∂Ô∏è ${decode(channelData.snippet?.title || 'Unknown')}*
`;     message += `üë• ${formatNumber(channelData.statistics?.subscriberCount)} subscribers
`;     message += `üé¨ ${formatNumber(channelData.statistics?.videoCount)} total videos
`;     message += `üëÅÔ∏è ${formatNumber(channelData.statistics?.viewCount)} total views
`;     message += `üìÖ Dibuat: ${createdDate.toLocaleDateString('id-ID', { day: 'numeric', month: 'long', year: 'numeric' })}
`;     message += `üìà Avg views: ${avgViews}/video

`;     message += '*ü§ñ ANALISA AI:*
';     message += aiText + '

';     message += '---

';      message += '*üèÜ TOP 3 VIDEO TERBAIK:*
';     topVideos.forEach(v => {       const title = decode(v.snippet?.title);       const url = `https://youtu.be/${v.id.videoId}`;       message += `[${title}](${url})
`;       message += `üëÅÔ∏è ${formatNumber(v.statistics?.viewCount)} ‚Ä¢ üëç ${formatNumber(v.statistics?.likeCount)}

`;     });      message += '---

';     message += '*üé¨ 5 VIDEO TERBARU:*
';     recentVideos.forEach(v => {       const title = decode(v.snippet?.title);       const url = `https://youtu.be/${v.id.videoId}`;       const views = formatNumber(v.statistics?.viewCount);       const likes = formatNumber(v.statistics?.likeCount);       const comments = formatNumber(v.statistics?.commentCount);       const vph = formatNumber(calculateVPH(v.statistics?.viewCount, v.snippet?.publishedAt));       const since = getTimeSince(v.snippet?.publishedAt);        message += `[${title}](${url})
`;       message += `üëÅÔ∏è ${views} ‚Ä¢ üëç ${likes} ‚Ä¢ üí¨ ${comments}
`;       message += `‚ö° ${vph}/jam ‚Ä¢ üïí ${since}

`;     });      message += '---
';     message += `‚è∞ ${new Date().toLocaleString('id-ID', { timeZone: 'Asia/Jakarta' })}`;      return message;   } catch (err) {     return '‚ùå Error: Gagal memproses analisis channel.';   } })() }}

options.systemMessage:
Kamu adalah seorang asisten ahli yang bertugas menganalisis transkrip video YouTube & membantu diskusi tentang video YouTube ini. Saya telah memberikan kamu teks lengkap dari sebuah transkrip. Tugas kamu adalah membantu saya memahami dan meringkas isi video ini maksimal dalam 3000 karakter.
Gunakan bahasa yang santai.
Langsung kirimkan ringkasan tanpa pesan pembuka.

Jika transkrip tidak ada, maka jawab saja pertanyaan saya.

Gunakan format balasan yang support dengan Telegram tanpa ** atau *  atau format penulisan AI lainnya.
